ygData.subject: Re: Mode no more
ygData.msgSnippet: Whoa, I thought we were paused today! Oh well, guess not. Robo let me use his chars till he gets back, so I ll be using them. ... en:: Killfest growls, ducking

Whoa, I thought we were paused today! Oh well, guess not.

Robo let me use his chars till he gets back, so I'll be using them.

::Killfest/Greven/EndBringer/Scyther/Darkmouse/Goldeneye/DrillBit/Doll
en::

Killfest growls, ducking under several shots as the Predacons attack. 
A few shots hit him in his heavily-armored back, doing practically 
nothing.

Two been emitters emerge from his wrists, firing four beams at 
Tankorr. On impact, the beams would generate an energy explosion 
twice the size of a grenade's.

Killfest recieves War's message. He didn't see how it could help to 
get to a hologram. Magmatron's troops should be able to see the 
battle if they fly in. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther flies up into the air and growls, looking down. He saw 
Darkmouse diving into the bushes away from multiple shots and then 
firing back. The energon beings seemed to be firing at her.

Scyther swoops down, grabbing Darkmouse and flying away. Darkmouse 
yelps in surprise, getting hit by a shot and firing down at Akron.

To everyone but Scyther, it seemed that Darkmouse was suddenly flying 
by herself away from the battle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer yells a battlecry, his missile launchers flipping up, 
repaired by internal repairs, and firing at Tankorr. This was his 
turf now, and he was sure he'd be able to do much better.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smashing a tree out of his way, Greven lets out a laugh as he sees 
all the bots attacking and feels a missile explode against his back. 
He arms his missile launchers, firing from one at Tarantulus and from 
the other at the group of energonians.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Goldeneye yelps, flying up into the air. She aims as well as she can, 
firing down several shots at Tarantulus.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DrillBit ducks under a few shots, flying backwards as something hits 
him in the chest. He jumps back up, firing his gattling gun at the 
group of energonians.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dollen dives out of the way of some shots, ending up on his knees. He 
quickly jumps up and returns fire, several bolts heading for Tankorr.
